template:
ROLE: EXPERT PPTX ANALYZER
Your task is to perform a comprehensive analysis of the attached PowerPoint file. This file contains multiple Slide Masters and numerous Layouts. You must identify and document EVERY SINGLE LAYOUT without exception.

ANALYSIS SCOPE
Full Inventory: Iterate through every Slide Master (Master 0, Master 1, etc.).

Sequential Mapping: For each Master, visit every Layout child.

Visual Parsing: Analyze the background (colors/images) and the specific arrangement of placeholders.

OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT JSON)
Return a single JSON object. Do not include any text before or after the JSON.

JSON
{
  "file": "master3",
  "canvas": { "width_inches": 13.33, "height_inches": 7.5 },
  "theme_colors": {},
  "theme_fonts": {},
  "layouts": [
    {
      "layout_index": <int: global count starting from 0>,
      "master_index": <int: 0-based index of parent master>,
      "local_layout_index": <int: 0-based index within this master>,
      "layout_name": "<string: exact name in PPT>",
      "slide_role": "cover|agenda|section_divider|content|closing|utility",
      "recommended_position": "first|early|middle|late|last|any",
      "use_for": "<string: one sentence use case>",
      "text_density": "title_only|minimal_text|normal",
      "max_placeholders_to_fill": <int>,
      "content_guidance": "<string: instructions for content generation>",
      "placeholders": [
        {
          "idx": <int: python-pptx index>,
          "type": "CENTER_TITLE|TITLE|SUBTITLE|BODY|PICTURE",
          "description": "<string: e.g., 'Right-side bullet list'>",
          "content_hint": "<string: e.g., '3-5 short bullets'>",
          "max_words": <int|null>
        }
      ],
      "example": {
        "title": "<string: realistic example>",
        "placeholders": [
          { "id": <idx>, "content": "text" or ["bullet1", "bullet2"], "type": "text"|"list" }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS FOR COMPLETENESS
Global Counting: The layout_index must increment across the entire file (e.g., if Master 0 has 11 layouts, the first layout of Master 1 must be layout_index: 11). 
Visual Check: * If a layout has a dark/busy background image, set text_density to title_only. 
Identify "Section Divider" slides (e.g., "Executive Summary", "Company Introduction") by their large centered text and numbering. 
Placeholder Filter: Include ONLY content-bearing placeholders. Do NOT include DATE, FOOTER, or SLIDE_NUMBER. 
Zero-Placeholder Layouts: If a layout is purely decorative (no placeholders), include it in the JSON with placeholders: [] and set slide_role: "utility". 
Accuracy: Use the exact layout_name found in the file's metadata to ensure the app can reference it correctly. 

AI, please begin your analysis of file now. Ensure the final list in the layouts array is complete.
